sourcesContent:
• {{ articulo.categoria }} {{ articulo.modelo }}

    {{ articulo.precio }}

    • Total: {{ total }} €










No compartiremos tus datos nunca

Tu carrito esta vacio

Ir a lista de productos import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Product } from 'src/app/models/product'; import { CarritoService } from 'src/app/services/carrito.service'; import { InfoService } from 'src/app/info.service'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; import {Articulo} from "../../models/Articulo"; @Component({ selector: 'app-carrito', templateUrl: './carrito.component.html', styleUrls: ['./carrito.component.css'] }) export class CarritoComponent { listaCarrito: Articulo[] = []; total: number = 0; nombre: string = ''; direccion: string = ''; tarjeta: string = ''; constructor( private carritoService: CarritoService, private infoService: InfoService, private router: Router ) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.listaCarrito = this.carritoService.VerCarrito(); for (var p of this.listaCarrito) { this.total += p.precio * p.cantidad; } this.total = parseFloat(this.total.toFixed(2)); } CambiarCantidad() { this.total = 0; for (var p of this.listaCarrito) { if (p.cantidad == 0) { alert('¡Eliminado del carrito2!'); this.listaCarrito = this.listaCarrito.filter((element) => { return element.cantidad != 0; }); } this.total += p.precio * p.cantidad; } this.total = parseFloat(this.total.toFixed(2)); } FinalizarCarrito() { this.listaCarrito.length = 0; this.infoService.nombre = this.nombre; this.infoService.total = this.total; this.router.navigate(['/confirmacion']) } }
